What is a "ghost gun"?
Well when someone says "ghost gun" they are referring to firearms that aren't registered to any government
agency nor have any serial numbers to identify them.
Now in the United States, these firearms are actually widely legal, as long as you build the firearm yourself and you have the intention to keep it forever.
But, it is extremely illegal for you to actually sell or transfer these weapons.

American's have been building their own untraceable firearms for centuries.
